member.name: T:Ore.Models.DatabaseConnection.DBConnection
member.summary: The class which instantiates the real database connection

member.name: M:Ore.Models.DatabaseConnection.DBConnection.openConnection
member.summary: Instantiate and open the database connection
member.returns: The real database connection

member.name: T:Ore.Models.DatabaseConnection.DBSQLServerUtils
member.summary: A class with only one method named GetDBConnection who returns the connection string to instanciate the database connection

member.name: M:Ore.Models.DatabaseConnection.DBSQLServerUtils.GetDBConnectionServer(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Use the informations of the DBSQLServerUtils class to create the connection string for the database connection
member.returns: The connection string

member.name: T:Ore.Models.DatabaseConnection.DBUtils
member.summary: A class that contains the basics informations in clear to instantiate the database connection

member.name: M:Ore.Models.DatabaseConnection.DBUtils.GetDBConnection
member.summary: Contains the database informations and uses the DBSQLServerUtils class to format the string
member.returns: The formatted string for the database connection

member.name: T:Ore.Models.EncryptingData.EncryptingUtils
member.summary: The class used to encrypt passwords before inserting them in the database or to find a match when login in
member.remarks: To encrypt, we need an initVector and a keysize

member.name: F:Ore.Models.EncryptingData.EncryptingUtils.InitVector
member.summary: The 16-bit initVector
member.remarks: The vector must always be 16-bit long in our case to work

member.name: F:Ore.Models.EncryptingData.EncryptingUtils.Keysize
member.summary: The key size to encrypt our passwords strongly

member.name: M:Ore.Models.EncryptingData.EncryptingUtils.EncryptString(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: The main method we use to encrypt the data
member.param: The data that we need to encrypt
A password that we uses to encrypt data
member.remarks: The pass phrase must be the same everytime if we want to have the real passwords back. We mainly use the plainText parameter to encrypt our passwords.
member.returns: The encrypted data

member.summary: The model that contains elements to communicate with the database to retrieve some login data

member.summary: The method used to find the user in the database or not for the login feature
member.param: The password of the user account

member.summary: The model that contains elements to communicate with the database to retrieve register data

member.summary: Finds the id of the user registered in the database if he exists
member.returns: The last user id

member.name: M:Ore.Models.RegisterModel.InsertNewAccountInDatabase(System.Int32,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new user in the database with his connection informations and gives him a personnal id

member.summary: Checks if a user is already existing in the databases with connection informations
member.returns: The boolean value that indicates whether the user exists or not

member.name: T:Ore.Models.ShellModel

member.summary: Retrieve all the data of only one day

member.summary: Gives the last id used for a task in the database

member.summary: Retrieves to the behavior code all the different tasks of the user that are not in a list

member.summary: Retrieves to the behavior code all the different lists created by the user

member.summary: Unchecks the task checked information in the database using her id
